home.title: Web Tools Collection
home.subtitle: Use various tools for web development and design in one place. All processing is done in the browser and files are not sent to the server.

image.title: Image Optimizer
image.description: Provides image compression, WebP conversion, and resizing features

font.title: Font Preview & Converter
font.description: Preview web fonts and convert to various formats (WOFF, TTF)

json.title: JSON Formatter & Viewer
json.description: A tool to format and edit JSON

api.title: API Tester
api.description: API testing tool based on Fetch or Axios

base64.title: Base64 Encoder/Decoder
base64.description: A tool to encode and decode text and files to Base64

tailwind.title: CSS → Tailwind Converter
tailwind.description: A tool to convert CSS code to Tailwind CSS classes

qrcode.title: QR Code Generator
qrcode.description: A tool to convert text or URL to QR code and download

timestamp.title: Timestamp Converter
timestamp.description: A tool to convert between Unix timestamp and date/time format

codeplayground.title: Code Playground
codeplayground.description: A tool to test and preview HTML, CSS, React code in real-time

sql.title: SQL Query Formatter
sql.description: A tool to format and organize SQL queries

xml.title: XML Formatter
xml.description: A tool to format and organize XML

texttoimage.title: Text to Image Converter
texttoimage.description: A tool to convert text to image and apply various styles

signature.title: Signature Generator
signature.description: A tool to generate and download digital signatures

regex.title: Regex Pattern Matcher
regex.description: A tool to test regular expressions and check matching results

storage.title: Browser Storage Manager
storage.description: A tool to manage local storage and session storage, add, delete, and view data

keycode.title: KeyCode Tracker
keycode.description: Real-time keyboard input tracking and keycode information

querystring.title: URL Query String Parser & Builder
querystring.description: A tool to parse URL query strings or generate new query strings

hash.title: Hash Generator
hash.description: Generate hash values for text or files. Supports MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-384, SHA-512 algorithms

unit.title: CSS Unit Converter
unit.description: Quickly convert values of frequently used CSS properties

wordcounter.title: Word & Character Counter
wordcounter.description: A tool to calculate the number of characters, words, sentences, and paragraphs in real-time
